description: Defines a Flutter widget StatusBanner that displays the current game status (turn, winner, tie) for a tic-tac-toe game, including visual styling and dynamic content based on game state.

classes.name: StatusBanner
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the current game status, including turn indicator, winner announcement, or tie message, with corresponding icons and colors.

methods.name: _message
methods.description: Generates the display message based on the current game status and player.

methods.name: _color
methods.description: Determines the color to use for the banner based on game status.

methods.name: _icon
methods.description: Selects the icon to display based on game status.
